story:
THE PROJECT

Hi there! You are very welcome to participate in the III International Danza Duende Gathering, under the subject "Times of Change". This event will take place in Serpa, Portugal, in July 18-24, 2016.

And why do we talk about Change? Because ART CHANGES LIVES. 

We, the Danza Duende International School, have been invited to participate in the "Noites Na Nora" festival during 6 days, to offer Workshops, Performances and Experiences that prove that human beings can develop their inner WISDOM through Art, improving our presence in our own lives and the world we live in.

YOU CAN BE PART OF IT! THANKS FOR YOUR HELP :)

- Make your € donation! We need to cover the travel, accomodation and food expenses of the more than 20 artists and professionals that will offer their art and workshops. 

- Be one of the participants! Registrations to attend our gathering are open, you can register online, soft and easy >https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1r4FSSUcepYWvRygblti4aYT6z_kqLqdEYja02T6VdK8/viewform?c=0&w=1

- Spread our project! The more people know the project, the more people that can benefit from it > https://www.facebook.com/IiFestivalInternacionalDanzaDuende/

- Visiting the Danza Duende website and subscribing to our newsletter to be aware of our next activities > http://www.danzaduende.org 

Here you can see photos from the last edition: https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.1010025562389524.1073741832.434998316558921&type=3

WHY HELP?

Danza Duende has a clear VISION of society that can be applied to Education, Culture, Health, Relationships, Government, Financial Systems... To say it in few words, we need to accept every aspect of who we are as human beings. Presence is the key to experience every event in life and transform it into wisdom. And the art of dance is a scientifically proved tool to be PRESENT. Everybody is able to do that and our objective is to keep working and growing in this direction.

The Gathering in the small village of SERPA, in the Portuguese Alentejo, brings a precious opportunity to share and be part of this vision for a whole week. After that, participants will bring the effects to their community, family and friends. 

Serpa, the village of the Dragon, offers us great infrastructures for workshops and shows, but due to the fragile situation in Portugal, we need your contribution. All artists, international and local, will share their art pieces for free. That is why we, at list need to cover basic expenses such as transportation, accommodation and food. We have estimated 5.000€ to cover basic expenses, but donations are completely free!

So, now that you know how and why you can help, we will tell you more about:

1) Who is going to be in the III International Danza Duende Gathering

2) What is Danza Duende

WHO WILL BE IN SERPA

Yumma Mudra & Michel Raji: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uUoDdG8npjU

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5nEl-1dI9AI

Belén Maya:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_TBGxwIl8O0

Salamantras Dance Company:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uhzvbTp9ltg

Baltazar Molina:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0SZvz6SWdho

And many more!

More info:

regis.danzaduendeportugal@gmail.com 


WHAT IS DANZA DUENDE

Danza Duende is the Art of Creating Fields of Wisdom through the Art of Dance. This reality is sustained by a Network based on human synergy and a School of profound trainings and practices.  

Her creator and founder, Yumma Mudra (watch her TEDX Talk: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zm0wgxGVrdk), started in 2003 to create artistic tools in order to reach a marvelous goal: DANCE YOUR LIFE. 

www.danzaduende.org

In the Danza Duende trainings we put our own experiences in common in order to create situations that conduct to the development of the natural human qualities in ourselves, as individuals and as a society.

All members of the Danza Duende Organisaion share this VISION. And most of them are students of the Duende Training.  Others are "satellite friends" whose work follows a similar or complementary sense, such as La Danse du Souffle de Michel Raji.
